00028                 
00029                 parent::__init();
00030                 if(!isset(static::p()->register)) static::p()->register = array();

00042         public static function write($path, $value) {
00043                 
00044                 static::setInit();
00045                 
00046                 $a =& static::p()->register;
00047                 $path = explode('.', $path);
00048                 while($key = array_shift($path)) {
00049                         if(is_numeric($key) and intval($key) >= 0) $key = intval($key);
00050                         if(empty($path)) $a[$key] = $value;
00051                         else {
00052                                 if(!isset($a[$key])) $a[$key] = array();
00053                                 $a =& $a[$key];
00054                         }
00055                 }
00056                 
00057         }

00067                 
00068                 static::setInit();
00069                 
00070                 $a =& static::p()->register;

00074                         if(!isset($a[$key])) throw new MissingKeyException($key);
00075                         if(empty($path)) return $a[$key];
00076                         $a =& $a[$key];

00089                 
00090                 static::setInit();

00092                 $a =& static::p()->register;

00114                 $a =& static::p()->register;
